data.title: The St. Paul's Schools
data.meta_description: Impact Report 22-23 - The St. Paul's Schools
data.text:
St. Paul’s honors loyal donors who consistently support the school year after year. These supporters have made gifts to

St. Paul’s for 10+, 25+, and 50+ or more consecutive years. All gifts, no matter the size, make a difference in our community.

10+, 25+, 50+ years of loyal giving

† = Deceased
